text: It's about liberating ourselves, simply. To teach us to discover — without books, for the magician must not be deceived — the deep law that each one carries in the axis of life. The accent shifts from knowing to understanding. And he that understands, creates. Wisdom is a specific weight of the soul, and not a sum of knowledge derived from outside. The thought has to incarnate in the life of the Spermatozoa. FIN El Cuento, 1968
title: Ley profunda
author: Alfonso Reyes
